# receive(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the subscriber that the publisher has produced an element.

## Declaration

```swift
final func receive(_ value: Input) -> Subscribers.Demand
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Subscribers/Demand] instance indicating how many more elements the subscriber expects to receive.
title: receive(_:)
